backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with authorization, storage mixins, and an extensive set of resident‑related types plus comparison utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Implements a migration module that filters and sanitizes resident data while preserving the full legacy state structure.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature‑evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for documentation or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, themes, and default element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that loads the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, resilient actor initialization, profile gating, and routing via TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog form for adding ADL records with predefined activity and assistance options, validating inputs and submitting to backend.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog component providing a form to record daily vital signs for a resident and submit them via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Form dialog for adding a medication administration record for a resident, including medication, time, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Dialog to create a new medication for a resident with dosage, route, schedule, physician, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large multi-section dialog to add a new resident with demographics, contacts, physicians, insurance, and medications.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog form for recording a resident’s weight entry with date, unit, and optional notes.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the brand logo with size and mode options, falling back to text if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog component that loads medication data into a form and submits updates via useEditMedication.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large form dialog that populates and updates detailed resident records including physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and medications.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile setup form that saves user name, role, and employee ID using useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Error screen displaying diagnostics, logout, and retry options when startup issues occur.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, and related backend data using a resilient actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor with timeouts, identity handling, and optional admin token setup using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theming variables, dialog overrides, and print-specific formatting.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Utility functions for adding timeouts, normalizing backend errors, and detecting non-fatal initialization errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds base-path-safe asset URLs by normalizing Vite's BASE_URL and cleaning slashes.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Contains helpers for converting nanoseconds to dates, formatting dates, and calculating age without timezone issues.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main resident dashboard with sorting, filtering, status updates, and resident management UI interactions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with Internet Identity authentication and branded UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Displays a resident’s full profile with data fetching, editing dialogs, medical records, and printing options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, shadows, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Snapshot describing project architecture, features, known issues, and versioned components.
